titlePart.text: SECTION B PERFORMING OPERATIONS
TRANSPORTING
SHAPING
WORKING CEMENT, CLAY, AND STONE
SHAPING CLAY OR OTHER CERAMIC COMPOSITIONS, SLAG OR MIXTURES CONTAINING CEMENTITIOUS MATERIAL, e.g. PLASTER
titlePart.entryReference: shaping materials in their plastic state in general
making layered products not composed wholly of these substances
shaping in situ, see the relevant classes of Section E

noteParagraph.text: The term "the material" is used throughout to mean:
mixtures with water-setting properties given by clay, cementitious material, or slag.
